scripts.supabase:update-types: echo 'PROJECT_ID:' && read PROJECT_ID && echo 'SUPABASE_ACCESS_TOKEN:' && read SUPABASE_ACCESS_TOKEN && SUPABASE_ACCESS_TOKEN=$SUPABASE_ACCESS_TOKEN supabase gen types typescript --project-id $PROJECT_ID --schema public > src/database.types.ts && prettier --write src/database.types.ts
scripts.supabase:link: echo 'PROJECT_ID:' && read PROJECT_ID && echo 'SUPABASE_ACCESS_TOKEN:' && read SUPABASE_ACCESS_TOKEN && SUPABASE_ACCESS_TOKEN=$SUPABASE_ACCESS_TOKEN supabase link --project-ref $PROJECT_ID
scripts.supabase:db-pull: echo 'SUPABASE_ACCESS_TOKEN:' && read SUPABASE_ACCESS_TOKEN && SUPABASE_ACCESS_TOKEN=$SUPABASE_ACCESS_TOKEN supabase db pull
scripts.supabase:migration-up: echo 'SUPABASE_ACCESS_TOKEN:' && read SUPABASE_ACCESS_TOKEN && SUPABASE_ACCESS_TOKEN=$SUPABASE_ACCESS_TOKEN supabase migration up
